settings.language.description: Choose the display language for the launcher
settings.accent_color.title: Accent Color
settings.accent_color.description: Choose your preferred accent color for the launcher
settings.accent_color.custom_tooltip_dis: Disabled while a theme is active
settings.accent_color.custom_tooltip: Click to open advanced color picker
settings.auto_updates.tooltip: Automatically check for and download launcher updates when available.
settings.discord_presence.tooltip: Show your current game and launcher status in Discord. Displays what you're playing to friends.
settings.beta_updates.tooltip: Receive beta versions and pre-release updates. These may be unstable and contain bugs.
settings.experimental_mode.tooltip: Enable experimental features and unstable functionality. May cause crashes or unexpected behavior.
settings.open_logs.tooltip: Automatically open the game logs window when launching Minecraft. Useful for debugging issues.
settings.hide_window.tooltip: Automatically hide the launcher window when Minecraft starts. Reduces desktop clutter during gameplay.
settings.concurrent_downloads.tooltip: Maximum number of files downloaded simultaneously. Lower values reduce bandwidth usage but slow downloads.
settings.concurrent_io.tooltip: Maximum number of files written to disk simultaneously. Lower values reduce disk stress and I/O errors.
settings.border_radius.tooltip: Adjust the corner roundness of all UI elements. 0px is square (Minecraft-style), higher values make corners more rounded.
settings.theme.title: Theme
settings.theme.description: Select a theme to customize your launcher's appearance
settings.background.title: Background Effect
settings.background.description: Choose a background effect for the launcher
settings.browser_login.tooltip: Use external browser for Microsoft login instead of embedded window. Recommended for Flatpak or if you experience issues with the login window.
settings.game_data_dir.title: Game Data Directory
settings.game_data_dir.description: Choose a custom location to store game data (worlds, mods, libraries, etc.)
settings.game_data_dir.tooltip: This setting allows you to store game data on a different drive or location. Useful if your main drive is running out of space. The launcher will automatically handle the location change for new downloads and installations.
settings.hooks.title: Game Hooks
settings.hooks.description: Configure custom commands to run before, during, and after game launch
settings.hooks.pre_launch.title: Pre-Launch Hook
settings.hooks.pre_launch.confirm_messag: Editing the Pre-Launch hook can prevent the game from starting if misconfigured. Proceed only if you know what you're doing.
settings.hooks.pre_launch.description: Command to run before Minecraft starts. If this command fails, the launch will be aborted.
settings.hooks.pre_launch.disabled_toolt: Enable editing to modify this field
settings.hooks.wrapper.title: Wrapper Hook
settings.hooks.wrapper.confirm_message: Changing the Wrapper hook affects how Java is executed. Misconfiguration may prevent launching.
settings.hooks.wrapper.description: Wrapper command to run Java through (e.g., sandboxing tools). The Java path will be passed as an argument.
settings.hooks.wrapper.disabled_tooltip: Enable editing to modify this field
settings.hooks.post_exit.title: Post-Exit Hook
settings.hooks.post_exit.confirm_message: Post-Exit hook runs system commands after the game closes. Proceed only if you trust the command.
settings.hooks.post_exit.description: Command to run after Minecraft exits successfully. Runs in the background without blocking.
settings.hooks.post_exit.disabled_toolti: Enable editing to modify this field
settings.hooks.warning.title: Warning
settings.hooks.warning.description: These hooks execute system commands with full permissions. Only use commands you trust and understand. Invalid commands may prevent Minecraft from launching or cause security issues.
